title: after creating new user, cannot login with it, processor load at 100%
body:
hi to all, 
i have strange issue with oc. before i explain what is the issue, i will say that i have configured iis on windows 2008 r2 server to use php 5.3.16. (this is setup correctly since all other php applications doesn't have any issues at all). after i have setup in handler mappings to use php-cgi.exe, i have putted src file of owncloud version 5.0.11 in inetpub folder. after i setup to use mssql server and put admin login, oc created the database and created new user. i have successfully logged on to admin user, and i found that oc created folder admin in data folder in parent directory. after i've created new user - "user" and new group called "users", i have added default space to 5gb. next step is to login on client pc with newly created user. after i did that, cpu load jumps to 100%, and i have also noticed that folder with another user is not created (in data folder). i have checked the database tables and saw that user exists... it looks to me that after trying to log-in with new user, i get stuck in redirection loop or something... unfortunately i haven't found any errors in logs... does anyone have similar issues as me?

requirements: 
- windows server 2008 r2
- mssql standard 2008 r2
- owncloud 5.0.11 version
- php 5.1.16 version

p.s. btw i have tried to setup newest versions of php but i got same issues...
